Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to the standards for openable windows in residential units
Summary: Requires openable windows in residential units to comply with certain mechanical ventilation standards.
LawCode: Amd ยง30, Mult Dwell L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the multiple dwelling law, in relation to the standards for openable windows in residential units
